name: CircleClone
description:
This game is still in development, there's a lot of stuff to add :

  1. sound ('coz now it's a little boring)
  2. orignal game have a collectable system, where you can loot diamonds in order to buy some others skins for your circle. This will be implemented in a future update.
  3.  better jump ? (i'm waiting for reviewers in order to upgrade this point)
  4. gameplay improvement ? (I've got a bunch of ideas that will come soon)

If you have any comments, please use the section below !

Thanks for playing :)
